title: Memes
content:
Gando meeting team China again for the first time since death in Vol 23 Chapter 8-2(1 special stickman because of the non-Chinese Imhotep).
 Sadly, Luo Yinglong had the highest ground in the end for this encounter.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Previous Chapter Next Chapter

book.title: Terror Infinity
book.description:
“Want to know the meaning of life? Want to live… a real life?” 
 The world shall change when you click YES. 
 In God’s dimension, you have to keep getting stronger, keep evolving to survive the never-ending horror movies. 
 Will you kill everyone in your way to reach the end as a lone king? Or fight along with your comrades and survive through the support of friends? Everything is just for staying alive, until you find the secret of God’s dimension. 
 Who is the true enemy?
